    • getUserDefinedFieldLetter

      protected char getUserDefinedFieldLetter()
      Description copied from class: ControlFile
      Returns the letter expected in the prefix of a user defined field in order to include the field in this control file.
      Specified by:
      getUserDefinedFieldLetter in class ControlFile
      Returns:
      The letter returned is:
      • B: for a binary package
      • S: for a source package
      • C: for a changes file
      See Also:
      Debian Policy - User-defined fields
